Plot: A group of Southern California high school students are enjoying their most important subjects: sex, drugs and rock n' roll.
Title: Fast Times at Ridgemont High
Actors: Sean Penn, Jennifer Jason Leigh, Judge Reinhold, Robert Romanus
tomatoConsensus: While Fast Times at Ridgemont High features Sean Penn's legendary performance, the film endures because it accurately captured the small details of school, work, and teenage life.
